about.label: About
about.title: VV Gold Saffron Bio
about.lead: At VV Gold Saffron Bio, we are passionate about tradition and quality.
about.body1: As a producer and supplier of premium organic saffron, we are dedicated to bringing one of the world's most prized spices to your table. With extensive experience in growing and processing saffron, we ensure that each thread is carefully hand-picked and handled with respect for the environment, preserving its vibrant color and rich aroma. We pride ourselves on offering authentic products grown in the best soil and climate conditions, and we are committed to delivering our saffron directly from farm to consumer, with European organic certificates located in Germany (www.kiwa.com), ensuring freshness and authenticity every time.
about.body2: Whether you're a professional chef or a home cooking enthusiast, at VV Gold Saffron Bio we're here to provide you with only the finest ingredients, transforming every dish into a true culinary work of art.

certificates.label: Certificates
certificates.title: Certified Quality
certificates.lead: Our products are certified with European organic certificates, located in Germany.
certificates.body: We are proud of our European organic certification, which guarantees that our saffron is grown and processed according to the strictest quality and sustainability standards. Our certificates are issued by Kiwa (www.kiwa.com), one of the most respected certification authorities in Europe.
certificates.cert1Desc: European conformity certificate (COI) according to EU Regulation 2024-3095, confirming the saffron's compliance with European quality and food safety standards.
certificates.cert2Desc: Detailed certified analysis report (38801-EU-I-A-AR-250131), confirming the composition, quality and compliance of saffron with European food safety standards.
certificates.cert3Desc: European inspection certificate (38801-EU-I-A-250131), official document attesting to the inspection and verification of saffron's compliance with quality and safety standards.
certificates.cert4Desc: Annex for labeling according to European standards 2024, containing information about product labeling and presentation according to EU Regulation.

awards.award1Desc: European organic certification issued by Kiwa, confirming that our saffron is grown and processed according to the strictest quality and sustainability standards.
awards.award2Desc: Recognition for the superior quality of certified organic saffron. This award reflects our commitment to excellence at every stage of the production process.
awards.award3Desc: Certification for organic and sustainable processing. Our high quality standards have been recognized at European level for the meticulousness of the cultivation process.
awards.award4Desc: Award for the best organic saffron in the region. This distinction confirms our position as a leader in the premium saffron industry and recognizes the superior quality of our products.
awards.award5Desc: Recognition for sustainable and responsible agricultural practices. We are committed to protecting the environment through cultivation methods that respect the natural balance.
